actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount of a loan the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee from 75 percent to 87 1/2 percent of the cost of certain vessels.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to increase the amount of a ship construction loan which the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee from 75 to 87 1/2 percent with respect to certain ferry boats.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount of a loan the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee from 75 percent to 87 1/2 percent of the cost of certain vessels.
